Blog.post: hmm..todae took bac e'maths paper..33/48..n i tink it sux..cuz i missed my A..by 1.25marks..=s..hmm..todae had geog n chinese..geog i totally reallie dunno how to do..headache..kept wanting to slp..i oso dunno i hang on how long 1..quikly write finish den slp..ugh..bad mi. =x den todae short dae..early dismissal..but i felt rilli xin ku..bcuz i kept wantin to vomit n got headache..e las period i slept thru..luckily foo nv catch mi..i tink she understans ba =) jazreel oso fell aslp..altogether..hmm..xD aniwae..so i was home..den called xh n she came my hse to do maths together.most of e time..spent gossiping..oops..!!hahas..den aft tt decided to go ginza mac for dinner..iw as rilli hungry..but e nauseous feelin stayed..so i ate my meal..den suddenly..i realise e choked up feelin at e chest n throat..den go toilet vomited chunks n chunks..sux..disgusting man..den aft tt went home..my mom cooked porridge..i eat liao..oso kept vomitin n vomiting..eat wad vomit wad..empty stomach now..=s so xin ku..hai..but yet..more disappointment came..sianssss...

dis is oredi e 4th entry..hahas..n apparently..nobody noes i'm here..lolz..hmm..ytd had a fun dae..fridae..quarrel w him..bad one..but now okaes le..ytd he still msg mi at nite..weeeee =) hmmm i rilli rilli still love him..no one else..nv break up w him at all n still w him n no one else..but oredi got ppl wu hui..i noe it's my fault..n tt's wad buggin mi now..hai..den fridae nite go find serena to study chem..er..not v productive..hahas..hmm..den aft tt gotta sent her home oso..hahas..n i walked home frm clementi aft tt..hmm..den sat..wenta meet serena at clementi mac to study as usual..i did abt 4units ba..phew~chem..v stressed..hmm..den e sec 5 guys came later..wa..noisy until cannot zai noisy..kip de-siaoin us..rilli lauf like mad..delon n dai hua oso..keep de-siaoing..but whn they sing..it rilli is nice lar..but i gu yi ma shang take my disc man..hahas..hm..den later they wanted to pool..den shell came..so i acc her to jurong east to buy piano books..hmm..den went bac to clementi to eat dinner..hmm..n i witnessed a netball kn hit by e car real hard..n banged real hard..my head hurt alot aft tt..den it started spinnin liddis n i didnt noe wad i was doin..shell was freaked out..hmm..den aft a while ok le..den i tried pool..wa..hen nan leh..so ma lu..den aft tt..sing songs w dai hua n shell..dai hua said smth to us which made us like..speechless?n pondered alot..hm..*surprised.n aniwae..i had to take cab home aft tt w shell cuz late le..den liddat lor..bac home..den online..den hai..xL came to tell mi got misunderstanding oredi..i damn vexed..how to have misunderstanding liddat??dunno which idiot go anihow sae..but aniwae..i've decided to kip my distance..i tink tt's e best..yea..i wish all e best for him..may he find e right one in future..

bad dae..hai..i dunno wad to do le..todae i wenta orchard alone..saw alot of pairs..saw henry n kelly oso..yea..sweet couple..hmm..den aft tt wenta golden mile complex..e place where i often go there for e ritual stuffs..i'm a taoist aniwae..i go there durin e chu1 yi1 n shi2 wu3 sometimes..n there's dis master there..he suddenly called to tok to mi..i was shocked..i expected it b4 tt though..cuz i was troubled oredi..over him..n he called mi in together w my mom..d first ting he asked was tt if i had a bf..n i said yes..cldnt hide 1..he sure noe de..n b4 tt..i kept fainting so he was e one hu cure mi aft e acupuncture..he said i'm too stressed by unnecessary tings..mainly..relationship..den he kept saein dose tings so zhun..it's like tellin mi i shld stop concentratin e relationship...i don bear to..i dunno wad to do..hai..=s

heh heh..todae was okaes..at least i didnt fall aslp in class..!!hahas..tt's bcuz i didnt eat my medication..tt causes drowsiness k..lolz..hmm..todae two persons absent frm class..garret n ivy..jaz was complainin n complainin n writing love notes..lol..hm..yeah..maths was okae too..mr choy took sometime to explain clearly those stuffs..hm..den aft sch..dear..mi..shell..jackson n jazreel walked bac together..but e 3gers took 963..apparently us lar..hahas..den i took jazreel to whr garret stays cuz she wanted to give him a surprise..hmm..tink they are having fun now =) hm..den i went home aft tt..*mixed emotions..n i have headache too..prolly too tired..*yawnz..tml got geo test..mus study le ah..hmm..todae i made jazreel teach mi lydia chorus part..hee..gotta get it soon =) weeeee..counting..195daes..

dis is e 1st entry in blogggggg...i still dunno how to use..*confused..hmm..still playin ard..eh..ya..nth much to sae..todae..COLD DAE..siannnnn..hm..sch was ok..missed physics..(woots..!) hahas..hm..yeah..guess that's all..
